meta.name: 四方果SQuareFruit
meta.about:
Indie electronic; lo-fi; Guitar pop; Post Rock; Once Indie, always Indie!

冇咗AMK, 冇咗普普, 更冇咗潮流偶像乜乜乜, 創作力都冇哂, 只剩下工作同遠遊,
磨人嘅大都會生活, 就係要結束一切先至可以從新出發, 真係Creative Destruction.

各種新局限之下, 一於放下結他, 收埋把爛聲, 唔再做 singer-songwriter-shit, 做吓小實驗.

人過中年, 愛上慢跑, 一心想做一張配合自己跑步嘅配樂, 點知今個夏天咁燥動, 好難唔回應一吓, 唯有先轉轉跑道, 來日方長, 長期作戰.

After AMK, after PopPop, after those mainstream pop productions, all my creativity has gone. All I left are work and travel… Urban life is tough. One needs to drop everything before one can start anything - what a creative destruction!

With new constraints, let’s forget the guitar-vocal-singer-songwriter-shit, just try a little experimentation for myself.

After a mid-age crisis, a love of jogging induces an idea of making a soundtrack for running. Unfortunately, an unsettling summer inspires responses to the life tragedy. Not a problem! There’s a long way to go!
